headline: Energy Transition Update - CIP's Flagship Fund Surpasses Target Fueling Global Energy Expansion
summary: Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners (CIP) has announced that its fifth flagship fund, CI V, has successfully surpassed its target of EUR 12 billion, demonstrating strong investor interest in greenfield energy infrastructure investments. The fund intends to support the energy transition by investing in a variety of technologies, including wind, solar PV, and battery storage, across low-risk OECD countries. CI V has already allocated 60% of its capital through six final investment decisions,...
